title: Smith County Justice (David Ellsworth)
description:
Smith County Justice by David Ellsworth (Ebook with original photos!)

The 100% true story of outrageous corruption in the law enforcement and government in the city of Tyler and Smith County, Texas, and the actual true, fact by fact case behind the 1991 movie Rush starring Jennifer Jason Leigh, Jason Patrick and Sam Elliot. Here is a synopsis of this amazing, very rare and hard to get book:

The book, which exposes corruption in the criminal legal system of Smith County, Texas, USA, was withdrawn by the publisher and removed from all bookstores shortly after publication due to pressure from the authorities exposed in the book. Since then, there has been a concerted effort to suppress the work, resulting in used editions of the book becoming rare and expensive (currently $500 on amazon). It is hoped that the availability of this electronic editition will make that suppression more difficult.

A very fascinating book indeed, especially if you liked the 1991 movie Rush
